title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. AA, ch. III, pt. 7356 - GOOD BEHAVIOR ALLOWANCES AND SENTENCE CALCULATION

State Regulations
§ 7356.1 - Good behavior allowances against definite sentences
§ 7356.2 - Definite sentence calculation

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. AA, ch. III, pt. 7356

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

Statutory authority: Correction Law §§ 45, 45, 804

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
